title: Masc Off, EXOTIC Groceries 7.22.20
itunes:title: Masc Off, EXOTIC Groceries 7.22.20
description:
In episode 677, Miles and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by Unpopular and This Day In History Class host Yves Jeffcoat to discuss Ted Yoho accosting Alexandra Ocasio-Cortez, the men's rights activist murdering a federal judge's son, Ruth Bader Ginsburg, the McCloskey's facing gun charges, Trader Joe's changing it's branding, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Ocasio-Cortez accosted by GOP lawmaker over remarks: 'That kind of confrontation hasn't ever happened to me'
  2. Lawyer Roy Den Hollander posted chilling remarks before murder at judge’s house
  3. Men's Rights Activist Lawyer Moves From Suing 'Ladies Nights' To Murder
  4. Ginsburg says she's undergoing chemotherapy due to liver cancer
  5. Missouri governor’s comments on coronavirus, McCloskeys raise eyebrows
  6. St. Louis couple who waved guns at protesters face charges
  7. Trader Joe’s to Change Branding Criticized as Racist Because It ‘Exoticizes Other Cultures’
  8. WATCH: Daringer - Afet

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
